TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemotePropertyInfoContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a property across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An IRemotePropertyInfoContract represents a property of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
To access one or more properties of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object. Then, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract GetGetMethod() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the `get` accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> identifies.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> that represents the `get` accessor of the property that this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract> identifies; `null` if the property does not have a `get` accessor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData GetPropertyData() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns information about the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> identifies.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"> that provides information about the property that this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract> identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> structure includes the type of the property value and whether the property is readable or writable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract GetSetMethod() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the `set` accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> identifies.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> that represents the `set` accessor of the property that this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract> identifies; `null` if the property does not have a `set` accessor.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument GetValue (System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract obj, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingFlags, System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract index, int localeId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument GetValue(class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract obj, valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingFlags, class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract index, int32 localeId) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> that identifies the object that contains the property.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; `null` if the property is not indexed.
A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that are performed by the property.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> identifies.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> that specifies the property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks It is recommended that GetValue implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is write-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValue (System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract target, ref System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument value, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingFlags, System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract index, int localeId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValue(class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract target, valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument value, valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingFlags, class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract index, int32 localeId) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> that identifies the object that contains the property.
A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> that specifies the property value.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; `null` if the property is not indexed.
The locale ID that the property will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
Docs.summary: Sets the value of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks It is recommended that SetValue implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is read-only.
